author: Peter Davies
title: Christmas ski holidays: 2015 deals and packages
text: Christmas is normally a pricey time to go skiing, but this year could be different. After poor conditions during the festive period last season, tour operators are starting to lower prices to tempt people back on the slopes during the early parts of this winter. Take a look at our pick of the best offers out there: Offers are subject to availability. Save £370 on the Trois Vallées Inghams ( inghams.co.uk ) is offering discounts on a wide range of packages departing December 19 2015, including to big-name ski areas such as the Trois Vallées in France, which has 600km of pistes to explore. Seven nights, chalet-board, at the Chalet Ariondaz in Courchevel Moriond (1650), from £599 per person (was £969) based on two sharing. Includes return flights and resort transfers. After poor conditions during the festive period last season, tour operators are starting to lower prices Family package Esprit Ski ( espritski.com ) is offering a family Christmas deal for seven nights, chalet-board, at the Chalet Arnica in La Rosière , France, for £2,479. This price is for two adults and two children (aged two to 11), departing December 20 2015, and includes return flights from Gatwick to Geneva and resort transfers. Get £50 credit and £50 off Iglu Ski ( igluski.com ) is offering £50 off per person on holidays to selected hotels and chalets, plus £50 bar credit so guests can enjoy a few Christmas tipples on the house. Resorts where this deal is running include Alpe d'Huez , Les Deux Alpes , and Belle Plagne in France, Mayrhofen in Austria, Sauze d'Oulx in Italy and Soldeu el Tarter in Andorra. Deal applies to departures from London Gatwick, Manchester or Birmingham airports on December 19 or 20 2015. Packages from £465. There's nothing like an Alpine Christmas Photo: TVB Kronplatz Canadian Christmas for less Ski World ( skiworld.co.uk ) is offering up to 40 per cent off holidays in selected properties in Whistler, BC, departing December 19 2015. From £2,045 per person based on two sharing for seven nights, self-catering, at the Westin Resort and Spa. Includes flights and transfers from Vancouver. Book by November 15 2015. Lift pass included Crystal Ski ( crystalski.co.uk ) is including lift passes in packages to resorts including Valloire, La Clusaz and Chamrousse in France, departing December 19 2015. Seven nights at the Domaine de l'Arselle apartments in Chamrousse, from £584 per person, self-catering, based on two adults sharing. Includes six-day adult lift pass, return flights and resort transfers. Save £200 per person Alpine Elements ( alpineelements.co.uk ) is offering £200 off selected chalets on trips departing December 20 2015. From £549 per person for seven nights, chalet-board, at the Chalet Colette in La Plagne , France. Includes return flights and resort transfers. Shred some snow like Santa this Christmas Up to 48 per cent off Sno ( sno.co.uk ) has up to 48 per cent off selected hotels and apartments. Seven nights, self-catering, at the Aparthotel Grand Montana and Belmont in Bansko , Bulgaria, costs £257 per person (original price £489), based on four sharing an apartment, departing December 19 2015. Includes return flights and resort transfers. Guaranteed £50 saving Neilson ( neilson.co.uk ) is offering £50 off on December departures to selected hotels and chalets, plus £50 bar credit in its Mountain Collection hotels or Andorran chalets. Seven nights, chalet-board, at the Hotel Ferienhof in Mayrhofen, Austria, from £629 per person based on two sharing, departing December 19 2015. Includes return flights and resort transfers. Group and child discounts Ski total ( skitotal.com ) is offering 60 per cent off child places (aged two to five years old), for families departing December 20 2015. Special group rates are available too, discounts vary depending on the number of people sharing a chalet. Telegraphtravel Follow @telegraphtravel
